ygData.subject: Re: Flicker/Rogues
ygData.msgSnippet: Flicker:  You were a member of a group of femmes called the Sisters. They believed in non-violence, and purity.  What they didn t know was you have a mutant

Flicker:  You were a member of a group of femmes called the Sisters.  
They believed in non-violence, and purity.  What they didn't know was 
you have a mutant spark.  If you ever used it in battle you'd be all 
but unstopable.  Both myself and the Rouges detected your spark and 
came after it hoping to gain a new ally.  But when I got there I was 
damaged in a storm.  The sisters took me in and treated me.  Even 
though I found out which one of you it was you wouldn't come with 
me.  I could have just forced you, but I was weeeelllll begining to 
like you a great deal, and despite the Sister teachings against it I 
believe you may have mirriored this.  When the Rouges arrived you 
wouldn't defend yourselves, but I would.  I took out a few of them, 
but they finally got me.  They would have slagged me, but you 
surrendered youself at the last minute so they'd leave me, and the 
Sisters alone.  That was the last I ever heard of you until I 
detected your spark recently and tracked you down.  I actually came 
here to help a Predicon I admire named Megatron.  And I hope I can 
convince him to help you.  Perhaps I should introduce myself.  My 
name, is Flicker.  Now come on, we need to get back to my shuttle.

He knows he shouldn't be out in robot mode on this planet for long, 
but he starts walking towards the base just to savor the walk with 
her, and to allow more time for questions.

--- In nbwrpg@y..., "cardhead649" <cardhead649@y...> wrote:
> Phoenix is a little surprised that she actually enjoyed the 
contact.  
> (It's the first time in nine years that she's been touched in a 
> positive way.)
> 
> "Please do," she requests.  "Not knowing is driving me crazy."
> 
> --- In nbwrpg@y..., Kyle Stewart <dewboy30816@y...> wrote:
> > Flicker looses control and grabs her, giving her a
> > gentle huge, and a quick peck on the cheek, then
> > releases her.
> > 
> > Flicker:  I didn't know you long, but if you like I
> > can tell you a little bit about your past.
